children.subject:
For anyone trying to be a tutor, there is this app called TASAP that allows you to register for absolutely any class of Berkeley and be a tutor. There is a calendar to put your availability as well as a chat feature. I'll put the link for appstore and android

Appstore: apps.apple.com/app/id1516541483

Android: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.eduhmc.tasap

history.content:
The private tutor list for Fall 2020 is now available here.  You will need to use your berkeley.edu address to access it.

If you'd still like to sign up as a private tutor for Fall 2020, please fill out this form. If you fill it out now, please send me an e-mail and let me know that you've done so, so that I'll know to check the list (heather [at] berkeley [dot] edu). We have some outstanding-looking tutors on the list, but it would be great to have some more. This is one way that you can provide service to your fellow students if you have a couple of extra hours per week. 

Hope your semester is going well!

Heather

history.subject: Private Tutor List for Fall 2020 is Available Now

history.content:
If you'd like to sign up as a private tutor for Fall 2020, please fill out this form. If you fill it out after September 15, please send me an e-mail and let me know that you've done so, so that I'll know to check the list (heather [at] berkeley [dot] edu). I will try to post the first iteration of the list by Friday, September 4.

Hope your semester is going well!

Heather
